argument.description: The value used to find the smallest integer value.

description: The PostgreSQL ceiling function returns the smallest integer value that is greater than or equal to a number.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT ceiling(32.65);
 ceiling
---------
      33
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT ceiling(32.1);
 ceiling
---------
      33
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT ceiling(32);
 ceiling
---------
      32
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT ceiling(-32.65);
 ceiling
---------
     -32
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT ceiling(-32.1);
 ceiling
---------
     -32
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT ceiling(-32);
 ceiling
---------
     -32
(1 row)
